projects.title: Letterblend
projects.description: Letterblend is a web app allowing you to blend your watchlist with your friends. Can filter by category, ask it to pick for you, and share the link to your friends.

projects.title: Divestrael
projects.description: Divestrael is a web app that aims to facilitate the boycotting of companies that are complicit in Israel's genocide of the palestinian people.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: My portfolio website. You're on it right now!
